Export.Routine: WWWDAYTEXT(YA) ;WWWDAYTEXT;TYBD;TAGTEXT MON TUE THU...; 2,12,2003 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| TAGTEXT MON TUE THU... ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| TYBD 2,12,2003 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; NEW YDAY SET YDAY=$$^WWWDAY($GET(YA)) QUIT $PIECE("Mon,Tue,Wed,Thu,Fri,Sat,Sun",",",YDAY)
